By the Chair of the Land Use Committee Council Member Katz:
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council, Section 197-d(b)(3) of the New York City Charter and Section 62-722(a) of the Zoning Resolution, the Council hereby resolves that the actions of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application no. C 0030301 HDK, a disposition of city-owned property, shall be subject to Council review. This application is related to applications no. C 030299 HUK and C 030300 ZMK that are subject to Council review pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter.
